name: The Idolmaster: Cinderella Girls - Gravure for You! Vol.8
summary:
This volume continues the ability to take pictures of two idols at a time, and to add music from CDs into the BGM list. When the selected idol wears the Dreamy Wedding or Dark Rose Fantasy outfits, the player can take pictures of the idols sitting with the dress' skirt billowing around them.
Idol Focus: Chieri Ogata
Costumes: Dark Rose Fantasy, Bikini of Siren, Dreamy Wedding
Locations: Halloween Manor, Nighttime Beach, Church
